data.subTitle: BCA student, full-stack developer in the making, and a curious problem solver. When I’m not coding, I’m learning how to debug life itself!
aboutDescription: Hi! I'm Khushal, a dedicated full-stack web developer and BCA student from Surat, India.
I specialize in MERN stack development, with strong knowledge in Java, Python, and C programming.
I have hands-on experience building responsive web applications, integrating REST APIs, and designing scalable backend systems.
I worked as a Full Stack Intern at DG Interns Hub where I built MERN applications, collaborated with teams, and improved performance of web apps.
During my Web Developer internship at Prodigy InfoTech, I developed responsive UI, improved debugging skills, and worked with Git/GitHub.
I enjoy writing clean code, optimizing UI/UX, and creating meaningful digital experiences.
Let’s connect and build something amazing together!

projects.projectName: Wanderlust – Holiday Rentals (Cabins, Beach Houses & More)
projects.description: Wanderlust is a full-stack holiday rental platform where users can browse and book vacation stays, while hosts can list and manage their properties. It includes a modern frontend and a secure backend for listings, authentication, and bookings.

projects.projectName: Zerodha — Online Stock Brokerage Platform for Trading and Investing
projects.description: A frontend–backend clone of the Zerodha trading platform that simulates online stock trading and investing. The project includes user interface pages and basic functionalities similar to Zerodha, giving users an experience of viewing stocks, placing orders, and navigating a brokerage platform.
A task management system with authentication, task creation, and deadline tracking.

data.contactParagraph: I’m currently open to internships and freelance opportunities. Let’s connect if you’d like to work together!
